TopicTitle: My procedural parts are always silver, can someone help me out here?

Articles.Content: I also think that my razorback parts are silver too...
My crystal ball is defective. So: no idea what's causing it. Too little information

@Bootycheeks752 You have Textures Unlimited installed so Proc Parts' config(s) for that will load, giving them their bland silver look. Delete the configs named "ProceduralsUnlimited" or "TexturesUnlimited" or get accustomed to colorizing it and keeping presets.

I don't care for Proc Parts' foil look either but customizing that can get pretty good if you know the UI and you like shiny parts.
tysm bro, i fr had no clue that that was the issue. ty
